sentence: Lee’s PAC doled out campaign cash to several Republican candidates, including Ohio Senate candidate Josh Mandel, Florida Sen. Marco Rubio and Utah Rep. Chris Stewart.
author: Bryan Schott
title: Who is leading the 2022 money race for Utah’s congressional seats?

sentence: Vance is trailing Josh Mandel, who knows how to be emollient to Trump.
title: Opinion: Behold the Republican somersaults for Trump
